description.translate: Go with pride, because only you could contemplate the darkness without flinching.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Médara\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Va avec fierté, car toi seule pourrait\"}","{\"text\":\"§7contempler les ténèbres sans fléchir.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Go with pride, because only you could\"}","{\"text\":\"§7contemplate the darkness without flinching.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7力§a3 §7速度§a2 §7攻速§c-1 §7恢魔§c-1\"}"]}}
